subject: Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Charlie Weis, who had a career record of 35-27 with the Irish, had six years remaining on his contract and his buyout has been reported to be as much as $18 million.
snippet: Charlie Weis, who had a career record of 35-27 with the Irish, had six years remaining on his contract and his buyout has been reported to be as much as $18 million.
